common.isRequired: This item must be filled in
home.proudctIntro1: {productName} is a automatic betting script, which can run locally without security issues
home.productIntro2: Users need to import a wallet private key for {brand}, and transfer {symbol} and USDT into the wallet. {productName} will automatically run the betting strategy set by users.
strategy.createStrategyHint: Please create your own strategy to bet the amount in your wallet multiple times. That will choose to continue betting every time you win, which will maximize your mining income.
strategy.continueNextRoundOnWin: Continue to the next round every time you win
strategy.inputAmountEveryBet: Please enter the amount of each bet
strategy.moreFastMoreExpensive: The faster the processing, the higher the gas fee
strategy.instructionDesc1: 1. The general strategy will continue to bet according to the strategy scheme until the maximum limit of bets is reached;
strategy.instructionDesc2: 2. Reasonably allocate the wallet amount for multiple bets, which will maximize your mining income.
wallet.importWalletKeyPls: Please import the wallet private key
